document_data.mainbody:
Riolakirk was the protege of the eadar of Asarem.
His father was killed during the Twelfth Ser√¥s War in a battle to protect the Ysivis hatcheries.
As the only heir of the eadar Riolacon following the war, Riolakirk had to abandon his life as a ranger in order to be instructed by the old shalarin. However, he was often distracted by his affection for the young shalarin dukar KaioaTara and his hunts in new waters with tritons and dukars.
Riolakirk was in his younger years in Osdahr a friend of the new young queen of Esroch Rienawyn.
